com.github.shynixn.petblocks.api.persistence.controller

Interface PlayerMetaController

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.lang.AutoCloseable, IController<PlayerMeta>, IDatabaseController<PlayerMeta>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    BukkitPlayerDataRepository, PlayerDataRepository, SpongePlayerDataRepository

    public interface PlayerMetaController
extends IDatabaseController<PlayerMeta>
    Controller for the player properties and meta data.
